entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.9
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains a new meeting parameter allowPromoteGuestToModerator - thanks Dennis and Timo from University of Osnabrück! Several core fixes and dependency updates were also included.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.10
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 introduces multiple new features! We have made it possble to pass a different presentation to each breakout room. You can now ban certain users from posting to the public chat. A custom webcam background can be passed to users in the join request. Administrators can opt out of allowing breakout rooms to provide the option of uploading presentation files. Several fixes and dependency updates were also included.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:
